data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample SMITH-121

Exposition S, Slope 8 deg, Geology: Gneisschutt, Tree line 1500 m, av. Tree height 30 m, Tree cover 90%, Shrub cover 75%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: Ta-Urw. mit ein. alt. Fi. Überst. Viele Str. , Film number: 718A
